author: ddewolf
msg: PLUTO-350: Deprecating url provider which uses absolute urls in leiu of new provider which uses absolute paths relative to the server root

author: vgritsenko
msg: Moved configuration file in WAR file to /WEB-INF/config. Updated
XindiceServlet to check for xindice.configuration system property
before attempting to load configuration from WAR file.

author: kevan
msg: Fix problem caused by use of Arrays internal class. You can't add entries to Arrays. Use java.util.ArrayList, instead.
